pageContext.claim: “We haven't had so much success in this -- in [Afghanistan], in this area. We haven't had success like this probably from the beginning, certainly as it relates to ISIS and al Qaeda, which is a very primary aim. But we've had very good success in talks with the Taliban.”
pageContext.analysis: The Post’s investigation revealed Afghanistan policy has been plagued by indecision and lack of clear direction. It’s hard to suggest that America’s presence in Afghanistan has been a “success” under Trump or any previous president.
